question: Write a letter to your landlord complaining about noise in the block of flats which he owns. IncludeWhere you liveThe problemWhat he should do
text: I am Monish, a tenant of yours from flat 203 in the Woodland Apartments colony that you own on the Al Maqam street. I am writing to you in regards to the issue I face with one of the neighbours of mine who happens to live in the apartment adjacent to mine, which I believe also belongs to you.

Every night we are disturbed by a constant barrage of loud noises coming from that flat. These noises are usually from musical instruments and they are very chaotic! This is very problematic for me as I have to wake up early every morning for work and these sounds don’t allow me to sleep on time.

As the person in charge of those flats, I request you to kindly talk to them in regards to this situation. If you can ask them to limit the timings of the music till 10pm, it will permit me to rest well and on time.
